title: Can't Login on EUNE...
body:
Since 02.07.16, I can't login on EUNE. My other account on EUWEST works fine.
I sent a ticket about the problem and Riot answered that they're working on a fix.
Two days ago I saw that post where they're saying that they can manually fix your connection if you send them a ticket with your data about router,ip etc and it seems like people can play after that.So I sent them a 2nd ticket, writing the things they needed.
Got the same response as before.
At least give some more details or anything.

replies.body:
Hey Tst7,

Would it be possible for you to review this thread on the EU boards about the issue you're describing?

http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/vIIOYAMo-updated-0550-09-07-16-eune-loginchat-issues-02-07-16

I send them the information they needed and it still isn't fixed. All I got are 2 responses.

"While we are trying to fix this matter as fast as possible, we cannot be sure that the fix will be stable enough to accommodate all of the information that we are receiving.
Please provide us with the IP and we will take it from here and make sure that you will not have problems."

"Thank you for providing me with the IP and thank you for your patience in this matter.
As mentioned before, we are currently working on fixing this matter as soon as possible so please bear with us ."

And that's all. I haven't played for 10 days. I invested money in this game and they can't even manually fix the account as the written on the thread.

What's the point in sending tickets to them?
I got the same problem man. I haven't played 9 days cause of this.
Our tech team can help out with your specific issue.  Please continue corresponding with them in your currently open ticket, as they'll be able to provide the best option for your issue.

Don't send a ticket, I did as well got the same reply and it was "solved", the issue is on their end/ISPs not ours, and looks like they're either working on a fix or not, nothing we can do, either use a VPN or make an account on EUW and hope they can resolve it quickly.
